page.title: 13Personality 1 (School Pupil)
page.content: Christopher Irvine is a boy aged 10. He lives outwith the study area in the district of Ireland and he and his sister Susan, age 7, are transported to school every day by minibus, a distance of 3 miles. Christopher's father is a policeman initially based at Stromness and it is for this reason that the family chose to live in Stenness. The father was born in Orkney but was brought up in Caithness and his wife also comes from that county. Mrs. Irvine works as a typist at Stromness Police station. Christopher's favourite subjects in school are gym and craft and he likes maths if the problems are not too difficult. His hobby is playing on his BMX bicycle at the weekends. When he grows up he would like to be a racing driver. We shall see!
